page.title: 16MEDIA READING
page.content:
{
In our class of twenty_five most enjoy reading. Only four never go to the library and nineteen go regularly. The most popular author is Enid Blyton with Roald Dahl a close second. Three quarters of the class buy some of the books they read and these they get from local shops like W.H.Smith. {Alcester library.}Alcester Library is a moden library in a complex of buildings housing a heath centre, police station and a fire station. You can borrow all sorts of books like story books, knowledge books, encyclopaedias, tree books plant books and lots more. you can even do your home_work there too.
